General.Name: JC Finance & Tax Interconnect Holdings Ltd
General.Description: JC Finance & Tax Interconnect Holdings Ltd. engages in heat treatment equipment businesses in China. It offers smart electronic taxation bureau and tax-enterprise connection platform. The company also manufactures and sells atmosphere furnace, vacuum furnace, sensing devices, non-atmosphere heating equipment, plasma equipment, software, and auxiliary equipment, as well as provides processing, after-sales, and consultation services. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Fengdong Thermal Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to JC Finance & Tax Interconnect Holdings Ltd. in May 2017. JC Finance & Tax Interconnect Holdings Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Yancheng, China.
General.Address: No. 333, Nanxiang West Road, Yancheng, China, 224100
